name: Surprise Eggs for Toddlers
description:
Your child want to explore Surprise Eggs and discover what's inside the egg ?
Does your toddler love surprise chocolate eggs ?
you have found the right educational game !

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination.

Surprise Eggs for Toddlers : play with puppies ! is simple and fun :
* choose your favourite egg
* decorate your egg
* discover what is hidden inside the egg : what a surprise !
* interact with the surprise
* collect all the surprises !

A lot of Beautiful Surprise eggs to decorate and have fun.

Funny cartoon sound effects !
When a level is completed toddlers are rewarded with celebrations and interactions.
If your toddler loves to play with Surprise Eggs this is the best game for your child.

Surprise Eggs for Toddlers : play with puppies ! is a must have app for little kids. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 0-7 years old
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-a lot of fun with puppies with this creative game
-Let your children decorate their eggs
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-open your surprise egg to discover your new surprise puppy
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination

Help your kids to learn and inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination!

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
developers: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
